Don't buy this game. Buy anything else it's not worth the money. The developers are the worst devs I've ever seen. They don't listen to the community ever, and on the rare occasion they do listen to the community they also add a bigger downside making it worse. Not to mention how buggy the game is. Just buy Minecraft at least then you might have some fun.

I would recommend for all who love multiplayer games..

Pros:
- Fun game to play with friends as a surv
- Fun to play alone and chill as the killer
- Decent gameplay
- Fine graphics
- Lots of content to unlock
- A lot of different killers that are completly different and survs
Cons:
- The grind to get a new killer/surv is insane
- No rewards for ranked and overall pretty bad rewarding systems (lvling up and promoting gives almost nothing)
- You basically have to pay real money to get new killers and survs
Very nice game. i do not play it a lot but when i play it i have a lot of fun.
